labels.label: Fix
labels.description: A change in a single file, the change is less than 5 lines

labels.label: Tiny
labels.description: A change in a single file , the change is more than 5 lines

labels.label: Minor
labels.description: Two o more files were edited

labels.label: Feature
labels.description: Thirty or more files were edited

labels.label: Monster
labels.description: fifty or more files were edited

labels.label: Calamity
labels.description: two hundred or more files were edited
